Class SnakeGame

extends java.lang.Object
    Backend for the snake game
    Author:
    Sophey

      Default move method, calls the move method with the current direction.
      boolean setDir(int dir)
      Sets the direction of the snake
      void startGame()
      Starts the game, resets the snake ArrayList for the original coordinate, sets the direction to right, and puts a random egg on the board.

        public void startGame()
        Starts the game, resets the snake ArrayList for the original coordinate, sets the direction to right, and puts a random egg on the board.

        Returns:
